text: The Guba-Khachmaz economic region is one of ten regions of Azerbaijan. It is to the north of the Absheron Peninsula, between the shores of the Caspian Sea and the Greater Caucasus mountains, making it geographically located in Europe.Lerman, Zvi; Sedik, David (2010). Rural Transitions in Azerbaijan. United States of America: Lexington Books. .Aras, Osman; Suleyman, Elcin (2010). Azərbaycan İqtisadiyyati Administrative districts of the economic region include Shabran, Khachmaz, Guba, Gusar, and Siyazan. ==Related pages== *Economic regions of Azerbaijan ==References==
title: Guba-Khachmaz Economic Region
